name: Planetary Dustoff
description: Planetary Dustoff is a moddable roguelite shooter. Go on a death riddled journey to sprawling alien environments and fight your way through hordes of enemies and epic boss battles. Take part in the revived Planetary Survey Program and help the Space Faction find a new home for humanity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1,3 GHz dual-core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 capable GPU with 1 GB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space
